author: ekryski
content: Yeah... this was part of the reason our question was prompted. So we're going with `finalized`. Don't feel comfortable approving with just the `justified` state.

author: pietjepuk
content: Well, block_root is the root of the block, state_root the root of the state (at a certain block), and beacon_block_root a reference to a certain block_root.
